definition: a routine meeting of a squad/team or class
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The teacher appointed her to chair the class meeting.
sentences.chinese: 老師指定她主持班務會。
